pullrequest.title: Final changes to make Atlas v4 & v5 stand and walk

content.raw:
More updates:

I made some changes in the [drcsim_4.2_latest_stable_walking](#!/osrf/drcsim/branches/compare/drcsim_4.2_latest_stable_walking..drcsim_4.2_latest#diff) branch after going over `vrc_final_*` and `drc_practice_*` worlds.  I'll probably merge it with this branch after more testing.
content.html:
More updates:

I made some changes in the drcsim_4.2_latest_stable_walking branch after going over vrc_final_* and drc_practice_* worlds. I'll probably merge it with this branch after more testing.
